definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
lit. when you drink water, think of its source (idiom); gratitude for blessings and their well-spring/Don't forget where your happiness come from./Be grateful for all your blessings!
the person who drinks it knows best whether the water is hot or cold (Zen proverb); self-awareness comes from within/to know best by personal experience
pinyin: ru2 ren2 yin3 shui3 , leng3 nuan3 zi4 zhi1

definition: You can lead a horse to water, but you can't make him drink. (idiom)
pinyin: qian1 ma3 dao4 he2 yi4 , qiang3 ma3 yin3 shui3 nan2
containing_words.word: 牽馬到河易，強馬飲水難

sentences.english: Confucius about drinking water and a single scoop sparse Louxiang refers only to this aspect.
sentences.chinese: 孔子談疏食飲水和單瓢陋巷指的都只是此一面。

sentences.english: But in Afro-Asian areas, the solution is not put enough attention.
sentences.chinese: 但是亞非落後地區的飲水狀況卻沒有得到人們的重視。

sentences.english: My swallowing reflex was destroyed, I couldn't even drink.
sentences.chinese: 吞嚥反射被破壞，我甚至無法飲水。

sentences.english: The picture showed a charming pastoral scene of cows drinking from a stream.
sentences.chinese: 表現了牛在溪邊飲水的迷人的田園風光。

sentences.english: Little feedstuff in the drinking spoon is drunk out after several times of drinking.
sentences.chinese: 飲水勺中的少許飼料經幾次飲水即被喝淨。

sentences.english: Little feedstuff in the drinking spoon is drunk out after several times of drinking.
sentences.chinese: 飲水勺中的少許飼料經幾次飲水即被喝淨。

sentences.english: Drinking water throughout the day is an important habit to pick up.
sentences.chinese: 全天候飲水補水是個必須養成的重要習慣。

sentences.english: She started drinking a lot more water. And no soda, not even the diet kind.
sentences.chinese: 她開始加大飲水量，不喝汽水，即便是無糖汽水。

sentences.english: At the same time, we have to drink from the source, respecting teachers, Thanksgiving.
sentences.chinese: 同時，我們還要飲水思源，尊師感恩。

sentences.english: And have you ever seen anyone actually clean the watercooler?
sentences.chinese: 而且你看見誰清理過飲水機的？

sentences.english: Neither are there many studies to say that guzzling water will prevent headaches or flush toxins from your body.
sentences.chinese: 也沒有研究表明過量飲水可以防止頭痛或排毒。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an automatically drinking device for fowls, which is made of nontoxic plastics.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型涉及一種家禽類飼養自動飲水器。

sentences.english: After washing the feeding and preparation equipment, rinse thoroughly in safe water.
sentences.chinese: 在清洗餵養和配製器具後，再用安全飲水徹底沖洗。

sentences.english: Bring along some juicy fruit to complement your water supply.
sentences.chinese: 帶些果汁以增加你的飲水量。

sentences.english: Drinking at least six glasses of water per day, and more when you are active.
sentences.chinese: 每天至少六杯水，運動時還應加大飲水量。

sentences.english: Water-cooler disruptions can be annoying but they can also be creative.
sentences.chinese: 飲水機旁的干擾或許令人討厭但也可能激發創意。

definition: variant Chinese character/alternative form of a Chinese character
